#summary Constructing an RDF graph using Scardf

{{{
implicit val model = new RModel withPrefix "http://family.eg#"
import PeopleVocabulary._
val jdoe = Res( "jdoe" ) a Person state(
  Name -> Anon(
    Given -> "John",
    Family -> "Doe"
  ),
  Birthday -> "1977-07-27",
  Height -> 167,
  IsMale -> true,
  Likes -> All( Swimming, Science ),
  Children -> RdfList( Res( "anna" ), Res( "bob" ) )
)
}}}

Equivalent description of this graph in [http://www.w3.org/2007/02/turtle/primer/ Turtle] is:
{{{
@prefix :       <person:>.
@prefix family: <http://family.eg#>

family:jdoe
  a :Person;
  :Name [
    :Given "John";
    :Family "Doe"
  ];
  :Birthday "1977-07-27";
  :Height 167;
  :IsMale true;
  :Likes :Swimming,
         :Science;
  :Children ( family:anna family:bob ).
}}}

A more deliberate example can be found at the [ExampleData] page.
